tools.name: search_knowledge_base
tools.description: Search the knowledge base using semantic search. Use this tool to find information from uploaded documents, PDFs, videos, and images. Returns relevant documents with similarity scores.

query.description: Search query to find relevant documents

num_documents.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: place_tak_marker
tools.description: Place a marker on the TAK network at specified coordinates. Use this when the user wants to mark a location, place a point of interest, or share coordinates with the team on TAK/ATAK.

message.description: Optional message or remarks to attach to marker

tools.name: send_tak_message
tools.description: Send a chat message to the TAK network (broadcast to all users). Use this when the user wants to broadcast a message or alert to all TAK users on the network.

message.description: Message text to send

tools.name: create_tak_route
tools.description: Create a route on the TAK network with multiple waypoints. Use this when the user wants to plan a route, show a path, or define a movement corridor with multiple points.

waypoints.description: List of waypoint dicts with 'lat' and 'lon' keys

messages.content: Hi there!

messages.think: This is a casual greeting. No tools are needed. I should respond in a friendly manner.
messages.content: Hi! It's great to meet you. What can I help you with today?
